p.b: The word restore has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which restore means "to store again."

simpleChoice.p: After you are done using the chairs you took from the closet, please restore them.
Jack found a wallet on the street, and he will restore it to its rightful owner.
Marianne should restore peace in the family by apologizing to her sister.
The antique chair is not in good condition, but Lila plans to restore it.
